cz.ive.simulation
Class CalendarPlanner

java.lang.Object
  cz.ive.simulation.CalendarPlanner
All Implemented Interfaces:
CalendarPlanning, java.io.Serializable
public class CalendarPlanner
extends java.lang.Object
implements CalendarPlanning, java.io.Serializable

Simulation calendar access point. Implemented as a public singleton, so everybody can plan its actios to the future.

Author:
pavel
See Also:

emptyInstance

public static void emptyInstance()
Empty whole the CalendarPlaner before the XML load. We just drop the singleton and create a new one.

getInstance

public static CalendarPlanner getInstance()
Returns the single instance of the planner, or null if it does not exist yet

setInstance

public static void setInstance(CalendarPlanner instance)
Sets the static reference to the singleton. This method should be called only in case of loading the singleton object from the serialized stream

Parameters:
instance - Reference to the new instance

plan

public Hook plan(long time)
Description copied from interface: CalendarPlanning
Plans Hook signaling after specified period of time.

Specified by:
plan in interface CalendarPlanning
Parameters:
time - period of time in milliseconds
Returns:
Hook to be signaled

replan

public void replan(Hook hook,
                   long time,
                   boolean clear)
Description copied from interface: CalendarPlanning
Replans Hook to signal after specified period of time.

Specified by:
replan in interface CalendarPlanning
Parameters:
hook - Hook to be replanned, it must be a hook created by plan() method of CalendarPlanner, or the ClassCast exception will be thrown.
time - period of time in milliseconds
clear - Determines whether the hook should be cleared before it's usage. If set to false, the hook will be only replanned, all listeners remaining. If set to true, the hook will be cleared to reuse the structure as a new hook.

cancelHook

public void cancelHook(Hook hook)
                throws HookNotPlannedException
Cancels the hook planned by plan() method. Notifies all listeners about the hook cancel and deletes the hook. If the canceled hook was not planned by plan() method, the HookNotPlannedException will be thrown.

Specified by:
cancelHook in interface CalendarPlanning
Parameters:
hook - Hook to cancel
Throws:
HookNotPlannedException
